caption.p:
Impact from hydropower and climate change on river-flow regime for entire Sweden. Seasonal distribution of total river runoff from Sweden (450,000â€‰km 2), with and without impact of: a extensive hydropower regulation, and b projected climate change (using a climate-model ensemble of 18 members, where the mean is bold). Smoothed 30-yr means of daily values are shown. The climate impact modelling was based on CMIP5 projections for the representative concentration pathways (RCP) 4.5 and 8.5 from: CanESM2, CNRM-CM5, GFDL-ESM2M, EC-EARTH, IPSL-CM5A-MR, MIROC5, MPI-EMS-LR, NorESM1-M, HadGEM2-ES. Each ensemble member was downscaled using RCA
62 and bias adjusted using DBS
63
